metadata.synopsis: In the Underdark there's a grave at Sussur Tree. Digging the grave unveils a collar of a pet dog. This collar has no use on the first sight, at least there's no magical properties. This AD happens when the collar is dropped from the grave.

2.speaker: Player
2.text: Strange collar... it's got runes all over it.
2.context: InternalNodeContext: Player has no idea whose grave and collar was found, but sees magical inscriptions on it.

0.speaker: Player

1.speaker: Player
1.text: Must have belonged to Lenore's dog.
